doc:
Angela Pleasence https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angela_Pleasence 0 Daphne Anne Angela Pleasence (born 30 September 1941), better known as Angela Pleasence, is an English actress. Trained in theatre, Pleasence's first major film role came in Hitler: The Last Ten Days (1973), followed by roles in horror films such as From Beyond the Grave and Symptoms (1974). She worked extensively in television productions and British miniseries throughout the 1980s and 1990s. She had minor roles in the films The Search for John Gissing (2001), Gangs of New York (2002), and The Gigolos (2005). Daphne_Anne_Angela_Pleasence ( born 30_September_1941 ) , better_known as Angela_Pleasence , is an_English_actress . Trained in theatre , Pleasence 's_first_major_film_role came in Hitler : The_Last_Ten_Days_(_1973_) , followed by roles in horror_films such_as From Beyond the_Grave and Symptoms (_1974_) . She worked extensively in television_productions and British_miniseries throughout the_1980s_and_1990s . She had minor_roles in the_films The Search for John_Gissing_(_2001_) , Gangs of New_York_(_2002_) , and The_Gigolos ( 2005_) .
